Posts.Content: I never really looked that close ... I just thought they were little angel wings. LOL
Posts.Title: What does the + sign mean next to all of your names?

Posts.Content: Here you go ... I think I'm 5 in this picture. Anyone recognize what I am sitting in? It's a plastic red and white chair. If I remember correctly the chair has a rounded bottom so you can swivel around easily. I forgot all about the chair until I found this picture but recall that I liked it a lot.

Posts.Title: New Challenge for you

Posts.Content: Hi everyone. Sorry I haven't posted in a while. I've been reading but even though I'm not posting I am praying for you all. Tomorrow ends week three of rad treatments for me. Question: Any of you rad girls experience being nauseated and/or light headed from rad treatments. I'm not on any BC meds and not in chemo but I felt that way this morning. Not sure if I can blame it on rads or if I am coming down with something.
Posts.Title: Nauseated with Rads ???

Posts.Content: From these posts it sounds like a great product. Do you really leave it in your hair for 1-3 hours though? I have natural auburn hair ... okay now it is natural gray but I still color it with over the counter products and get it as close as I can to my old auburn color which I only leave in for 20 minutes. When looking for this product is it in a box like the other hair colors or in a smaller package? Am I looking for a tube of powder? Thx for your help.
Posts.Title: Dying Hair with Henna.

Posts.Content: Thank you. I'll check out the Whole Food store this weekend.
